67 /*========== Static Function Prototypes =====================================*/
68 static void SYSM_DummyCallback(SYSM_TASK_ID_e taskId);
69 
70 /*========== Extern Constant and Variable Definitions =======================*/
71 /* DOCUMENTATION marker - sys_mon config entry */
72 SYSM_MONITORING_CFG_s sysm_ch_cfg[] = {
73  {SYSM_TASK_ID_ENGINE,
74  SYSM_ENABLED,
75  FTSK_TASK_ENGINE_CYCLE_TIME,
76  FTSK_TASK_ENGINE_MAXIMUM_JITTER,
77  SYSM_RECORDING_ENABLED,
78  SYSM_HANDLING_SWITCH_OFF_CONTACTOR,
79  SYSM_DummyCallback},
80  {SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_1ms,
81  SYSM_ENABLED,
82  FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_1MS_CYCLE_TIME,
83  FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_1MS_MAXIMUM_JITTER,
84  SYSM_RECORDING_ENABLED,
85  SYSM_HANDLING_SWITCH_OFF_CONTACTOR,
86  SYSM_DummyCallback},
87  {SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_10ms,
88  SYSM_ENABLED,
89  FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_10MS_CYCLE_TIME,
90  FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_10MS_MAXIMUM_JITTER,
91  SYSM_RECORDING_ENABLED,
92  SYSM_HANDLING_SWITCH_OFF_CONTACTOR,
93  SYSM_DummyCallback},
94  {SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_100ms,
95  SYSM_ENABLED,
96  FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_100MS_CYCLE_TIME,
97  FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_100MS_MAXIMUM_JITTER,
98  SYSM_RECORDING_ENABLED,
99  SYSM_HANDLING_SWITCH_OFF_CONTACTOR,
100  SYSM_DummyCallback},
101  {SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_ALGORITHM_100ms,
102  SYSM_ENABLED,
103  FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_ALGORITHM_100MS_CYCLE_TIME,
104  FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_ALGORITHM_100MS_MAXIMUM_JITTER,
105  SYSM_RECORDING_ENABLED,
106  SYSM_HANDLING_SWITCH_OFF_CONTACTOR,
107  SYSM_DummyCallback},
108 };
109 /* DOCUMENTATION marker - sys_mon config exit */
110 
111 FAS_STATIC_ASSERT(
112  (sizeof(sysm_ch_cfg) / sizeof(SYSM_MONITORING_CFG_s)) == (uint32_t)SYSM_TASK_ID_MAX,
113  "invalid sys_mon configuration!");
114 
115 /*========== Static Function Implementations ================================*/
116 /**
117  * @brief dummy callback function of system monitoring error events
118  */
119 static void SYSM_DummyCallback(SYSM_TASK_ID_e taskId) {
120  /* this is a dummy implementation and not using the argument here is fine */
121  (void)taskId;
122  /* Dummy function therefore it is empty */
123 }
124 
125 /*========== Extern Function Implementations ================================*/
126 
127 /*========== Externalized Static Function Implementations (Unit Test) =======*/
128 #ifdef UNITY_UNIT_TEST
129 void TEST_SYSM_DummyCallback(SYSM_TASK_ID_e taskId) {
130  return SYSM_DummyCallback(taskId);
131 }
132 #endif
